segments.text: The boy is reaching into that cookie jar like he’s on a mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the stool wobbling, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying that plate, completely oblivious to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s going to be in for a surprise when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids get their cookies before anything bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
